page.title: 16THE RIVER EDEN AND ITS FISH
page.content:
The River Eden is a clean river so that if you are thirsty you could stop for a drink. The Eden is also good for fishing. Some other rivers I have seen have few fish in them. The fish I caught on Sunday was only about twenty mm long. That was a rainbow trout. The minnow was forty six mm long. On Sunday 26th May 1985 I went down to the Eden. The water had risen since the last time I was there.I was on the other side and it was warm enough to paddle in.When the Eden leaves our area it has about five miles to go until it reaches the sea.
Karl Leaburn.
